system.description:
You learned your magic in some difficult circumstances and have blended it with a healthy dollop of mundane tricky and improvisation as a result. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or witch spellcasting ability score increases by 1 to a maximum of 20.
  • You add the obscurement school to the list of witch spells for you. 
  • Half your rogue levels count as witch levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.9xnbz4ye27kxob0y]{Witch’s Brew} feature.
  • You can use Witch’s Brew to make @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.erxssofi2jlptyv7]{Smoke Bombs} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ukcav3i8dudpalir]{Tanglefoot Bags}.
  • Half your witch levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.e5mepl86zsavxhrp]{Self-Preservation} feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in rogue, 3 levels in witch
